name: a fickle light #3
description: from a series - a fickle light - that focuses on artificial light and its effect on urban fauna and flora. Although light pollution is only one factor, A july 2021 report (Insect decline in the Anthropocene) surveying 11 scientific papers updates the original 'insect apocalypse' report and notes that " light pollution is driving local declines in suburban and urban locations".
